Region: Johannesburg Metro, Cape Town Metro, Durban Metro; Method: The methods included in the current population size exercise were: (i) the unique object, event and service multipliers, (ii) successive sampling PSE (SS-PSE), and (iii) a synthesis of the methods using the Anchored Multiplier.  The Anchored Multiplier is a novel Bayesian approach, which synthesizes the PSE produced by multipliers coupled to a prior estimate to arrive at a single consensus estimate and a 95% credible interval; Source: Behavioral Surveillance Survey (Respondent driven sampling in 3 Metropolitan cities - Johannesburg, Durban and Cape Town)
